title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.

title: You Can't Take It with You
description: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.

title: Bringing Up Baby
description: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

title: Angels with Dirty Faces
description: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

title: Jezebel
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: In 1850s Louisiana, a free-spirited Southern belle loses her fiancé due to her stubborn vanity and pride, and vows to win him back.

title: Pygmalion
description: A phonetics instructor bets that he can pass a street urchin off as a lady.

title: The Lady Vanishes
description: While traveling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady has disappeared from the train.

title: Holiday
description: A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.

title: Boys Town
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A priest establishes a school for wayward boys, but his work is threatened by a rebellious new arrival.

title: The Citadel
description: An idealistic young doctor tries to treat the coughing miners of Wales, but finds his efforts blocked by established medical practices.

title: Four Daughters
description: A vibrant family of four musical sisters sees their lives turned upside down when a cynical, down-on-his-luck composer enters their home.

title: Alexander's Ragtime Band
description: A classical violinist scandalizes his family by pursuing a career in ragtime music and falling for a singer.

title: Test Pilot
description: A reckless test pilot, his wife, and his best friend struggle with the dangers of his profession.

title: Marie Antoinette
description: The tragic life of the Austrian princess who became the Queen of France and was eventually beheaded during the French Revolution.

title: Algiers
description: A notorious French jewel thief hiding in the Casbah of Algiers is lured out of hiding by a beautiful French tourist.

title: Three Comrades
description: Three German soldiers return home after WWI and open an auto repair shop, but their camaraderie is tested by love and political unrest.

title: The Dawn Patrol
description: During WWI, the commanding officer of a Royal Flying Corps squadron has to send his young pilots to near-certain death.

title: Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
description: A wealthy American playboy marries his eighth wife, who is determined to make the marriage last on her own terms.

title: Carefree
description: A psychiatrist tries to help his friend's indecisive fiancée, only to have her fall in love with him instead.

title: Vivacious Lady
description: A botany professor marries a nightclub singer on a whim and tries to break the news to his conservative family.

title: Room Service
description: A theatrical producer and his troupe try to avoid being evicted from their hotel room before their play opens.

title: Merrily We Live
description: A wealthy woman has a habit of hiring tramps as servants, much to the dismay of her family.

title: Of Human Hearts
description: A preacher's son clashes with his father and leaves home to become a doctor during the Civil War, neglecting his mother.

title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
description: Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn witness a murder and have many adventures on the Mississippi River.

title: Mad About Music
description: A girl at a Swiss boarding school invents a wealthy father to impress her friends, but then has to produce him.

title: Block-Heads
description: Twenty years after WWI, Stan is still guarding a trench in France. Oliver finds him and brings him home, leading to chaos.

title: The Amazing Dr. Clitterhouse
description: A doctor studies the physical reactions of criminals during their crimes and eventually becomes a criminal himself.

title: A Christmas Carol
description: An elderly miser learns the error of his ways on Christmas Eve when he is visited by three spirits.

title: Love Finds Andy Hardy
description: Andy Hardy juggles three girlfriends while his steady girl is away, complicating his life considerably.

title: Suez
description: Ferdinand de Lesseps dreams of building a canal through the Suez isthmus, despite political opposition and personal tragedy.

title: The Great Waltz
description: A biographical film about Johann Strauss II, the Waltz King.

title: If I Were King
description: Poet François Villon engages in a battle of wits with King Louis XI in 15th century Paris.

title: A Yank at Oxford
description: A cocky American student runs into trouble when he transfers to the famed British college.

title: The Shopworn Angel
description: A cynical showgirl falls in love with a naive soldier who is about to be shipped off to World War I.

title: Three Blind Mice
description: Three sisters leave their Kansas chicken farm to hunt for rich husbands in California.

title: Too Hot to Handle
description: A newsreel cameraman and a rival reporter compete for stories and for the affections of a female aviator.

title: The Cowboy and the Lady
description: A bored socialite poses as a maid and falls for a rodeo cowboy.

title: Kentucky
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: Two horse-breeding families in Kentucky have been feuding since the Civil War, but their children fall in love.

title: The Young in Heart
description: A family of con artists befriends a lonely, rich old woman and plans to swindle her, but her kindness begins to change them.

title: Hôtel du Nord
description: The lives of the quirky inhabitants of a hotel by the Canal Saint-Martin in Paris intersect.

title: Port of Shadows
description: A deserter tries to leave France for South America but falls in love with a woman and gets involved with local gangsters.

title: La Bête Humaine
description: A train engineer falls in love with a woman who helps her husband commit a murder.

title: The Baker's Wife
oscars_won_details: National Board of Review Award for Best Foreign Language Film
description: A baker stops baking bread for his village when his wife runs off with a handsome shepherd.

title: Alexander Nevsky
description: In 1242, Russia is invaded by the Teutonic Knights of Germany, and Prince Alexander Nevsky is called upon to rally the people to defend their land.

title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm
description: A talented young singer is chosen to be the radio spokesperson for a cereal company.

title: The Buccaneer
description: During the War of 1812, pirate Jean Lafitte helps Andrew Jackson defend New Orleans against the British.

title: Sweethearts
oscars_won_details: Special Award (Oliver Marsh and Allen Davey for color cinematography)
description: A successful Broadway singing couple are manipulated into separating by their producer.

title: A Slight Case of Murder
description: After Prohibition ends, a bootlegger tries to go legitimate but finds the transition difficult when he finds four dead bodies in his house.

title: Bank Holiday
description: A group of people head to the seaside for a bank holiday weekend, where their lives intertwine in various dramatic ways.

title: Spawn of the North
oscars_won_details: Special Award (For outstanding achievement in creating special photographic and sound effects)
description: Two fisherman friends in Alaska find their relationship tested when one joins a gang of fish pirates.
